name: OneZekon
description:
YOUR PURPOSE

Rocket through these mazes as you compete at beating the clock! Time is ticking, and there is only so much time you can have for each level. Use all the tools at your disposal to prove that you have the reactions to take on this game.

GAMEPLAY

Tiny mazes line your path to victory, which you must analyze and find one way from one end, to the other. Be careful, you only have one second to beat any of these, after the observation period. As the game progresses, the gameplay becomes more intense.

TOOLS

This game was built using GameMaker Studio 2, with sounds from ChipTone and music made using Music Maker Jam. All art was made using GIMP and icons utilizing Photoscape X.

Please review this game after playing it, and give it a rating based on your experience.
